section.title: Bstar Class Reference

para.para: Overall STAR class to hold all data blocks and options for I/O..

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Overall STAR class to hold all data blocks and options for I/O..

literallayout.computeroutput: The split flag allows the user to output data blocks in separate files in stead of one big file. The line length field allows the user to output long lines without wrapping it around. The comments are ignored but output to the a new file - this can be used to document the history of the file. The STAR database is a hierarchy consisting of blocks, each with a set of items.
